item.title: Bicep Troubleshooting
item.description: Some basic “troubleshooting” with Azure Bicep So, let me start with this. The team and the community behind Azure Bicep are amazing. There are some great examples here. I often use these as a base and the rip apart or add to meet my needs, you do NOT need to start from ground zero. :smile: When you are deploying bicep templates you command will look something like this. $bicepFile = ".
